snippet.title: The Sun Shines Over Us - Visual Novel (English/ Indonesia) Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sun Shines Over Us (Menggapai Matahari)

The Sun Shines Over Us is a touching empathetic narrative game with choices and multiple endings in an Indonesian high school.
You play as Mentari, a victim of bullying who just transferred school and trying to recover from her past trauma.
In the game, you will help her making choices through school life and experience life changing events that will affect her future. 
In school there are many unique students, each with their own different characters and neuroses.


Download Here
Google Play : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nijigames.menggapaimatahari
Appstore      : Coming Soon
PC                 : Coming Soon


Social Media
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nijigamesstudio & https://twitter.com/eternaldream1st
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thesunshinesoverus

The game ia collaboration between 2 Indonesia indie game developer Niji Games and Eternal Dream Studio.
Thank you for watching/ playing...
